statement.p: The graph below shows the distance a cat is from his bowl of milk over time. Which sentence is a good match for the graph?Â

ol.li: The cat ran away from the milk at a rate of 2 feet per second.
The cat ran away from the milk at a rate of 5 feet per second.
The cat was 10 feet away from the milk and ran toward it reaching it after 5 seconds.
The cat was 10 feet away from the milk and ran away from it at a rate of 5 feet per second.
The cat was 5 feet away from the milk and ran toward it reaching it after 10 seconds.

ul.li: A: The cat ran away from the milk at a rate of 2 feet per second.
